scripts.jenkins: npm run pretest && npm run test:browserless
scripts.pretest: npm run qunit-fixture && npm run babel:tests && npm run npmcopy
scripts.test:browser: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- -b chrome -b firefox --no-isolate -h
scripts.test:browserless: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && node build/tasks/node_smoke_tests.js && node build/tasks/promises_aplus_tests.js && npm run test:unit -- -b jsdom -m basic
scripts.test:jsdom: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- -b jsdom -m basic
scripts.test:node_smoke_tests: npm run pretest && npm run build:all && node build/tasks/node_smoke_tests.js
scripts.test:firefox: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- -v -b firefox --no-isolate -h
scripts.test:safari: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- -b safari --no-isolate
scripts.test:amd: npm run pretest && npm run build:main && npm run test:unit -- --amd --no-isolate -h
scripts.test:no-deprecated: npm run pretest && npm run build -- -e deprecated && npm run test:unit -- --no-isolate -h
scripts.test:selector-native: npm run pretest && npm run build -- -e selector && npm run test:unit -- --no-isolate -h
scripts.test:slim: npm run pretest && npm run build -- --slim && npm run test:unit -- --no-isolate -h
scripts.test: npm run build:all && npm run lint && npm run test:browserless && npm run test:browser && npm run test:amd && npm run test:slim && npm run test:no-deprecated && npm run test:selector-native
